items.sentence: Why didn\'t you tell us there was a witness?
Come on, guys, this shouldn\'t be that hard.
There were many rotten apples in the basket.
There were no radios in Japan in those days.
Mary\'s husband told me she wasn\'t at home.
I wonder whether Tom noticed the difference.
Tom said that he was glad that you\'re back.
Tom said that he\'d like to help us do that.
Tom said that you\'d be too busy to help us.
We have to find out what Tom is allergic to.
We have to find out what Tom wants us to do.
We have to rent a room to hold the party in.
We have to take advantage of this situation.
I\'ll let you know when it has been decided.
I\'ll make sure Tom goes to school tomorrow.
I\'ll make sure Tom has everything he needs.
I\'ll make you happy no matter what happens.
I\'ll meet you down at the station tomorrow.
I thought you said you didn\'t speak French.
I thought you\'d probably already gone home.
I told Tom that I really wasn\'t interested.
Tom said the accident wasn\'t Mary\'s fault.
Do you have anything you\'d like to tell me?
You\'re not eating very much. What\'s wrong?
What\'s the average lifespan of a butterfly?
What\'s the name of the disease Tom died of?
What\'s the phone number of the pizza place?
What\'s your favorite memory from childhood?
Macaroni and cheese is Tom\'s favorite food.
There was just one problem with Tom\'s plan.
There\'s still plenty that needs to be done.
Tom doesn\'t have as much free time as I do.
Tom doesn\'t know either Mary or her sister.
Tom doesn\'t love you as much as I love you.
I watch the evening news while I eat dinner.
Let us know how we may be of service to you.
Tom doesn\'t want you to find out the truth.
Tom dropped his glass, but it didn\'t break.
Tom really should\'ve given Mary more money.
Tom said he hoped that he\'d be able to win.
Tom said he isn\'t planning to buy anything.
Our boss doesn\'t let us take coffee breaks.
Our problems are nothing compared to Tom\'s.
It\'s warmer in the house. Let\'s go inside.
Tom became deeply interested in art history.
Tom bought two tickets and a bag of popcorn.
Tom can hardly hear without his hearing aid.
Tom carried two boxes into the storage room.
Tom looked like he hadn\'t shaved in a week.
Tom looked like he wasn\'t enjoying himself.
